workshoptitle: Secure your encryption keys on an HSM you own to address Security and Sovereignty

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Secure your cloud encryption keys on your own HSM to meet Security and Sovereignty requirements.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for attendees using OCW23 provided tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Link creation between OCI and you HSM and Master Encryption Key creation
Lab 2a: Bring Your Own Key to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (BYOK to OCI)
Lab 2b: Hold Your Own Key (HYOK): Configure External Key Management between OCI and your HSM
Lab 3: Configure Customer Managed Encryption for OCI Resources
Lab 4: Emergency simulation test: blocking data access
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
